comment: Please Take him. Awesome professor who is clearly passionate about sports. Workload is more than manageable and projects are engaging.

This professor is outstanding his work is clearly laid out to the point to where you may not have to even reach out there is homework,discussiions, and warning 3 k=lockdown webcam exams which are not to bad at all.take this teacher if you wanna pass

Professor Goebert was A+, and made this class very easy to consume in a 4 week summer course. The projects & discussions were fun and conceptually relevant. I wish I could take this class 5 times a semester. Take!!!

One of my favorite professors I've ever had! I've had him as my professor for multiple classes now and you can tell he actually cares about his students and is always willing to work with you if you need help. I would highly recommend any of his classes to any SM student!

Took him online and wish I had him in person! I really enjoyed the assignments we did during the semester and it was all very manageable. He definitely knows how hectic college can be and does his best to help his students succeed. 11/10 class definitely recommend!!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class
